DzRenderDataEvent Class Reference
[Rendering Classes]

Class for passing data to the renderhandler from a separate thread. More...

#include <dzrenderhandler.h>

List of all members.

Public Functions

 DzRenderDataEvent (const DzRenderData &data)

Detailed Description

Class for passing data to the renderhandler from a separate thread.

When rendering is accomplished on another thread, post this event to the handler rather than calling passData to pass the image data. (subclasses need not worry about listening for this event - when recieved, passData() will be called on the GUI thread).
